parse.title: List of archaeological sites by continent and age

text.*:
This list of archaeological sites is sorted by continent and then by the age of the site. For one sorted by country, see the list of archaeological sites by country.

Contents

  • 1 Asia
    • 1.1 Palaeolithic
      • 1.1.1 Lower
      • 1.1.2 Middle
      • 1.1.3 Upper
    • 1.2 Mesolithic
    • 1.3 Neolithic
    • 1.4 Bronze Age
    • 1.5 Iron Age
    • 1.6 Greek and Roman Period
  • 2 Africa
    • 2.1 Palaeolithic
      • 2.1.1 Pre-Palaeolithic (before stone tools)
      • 2.1.2 Lower Palaeolithic
      • 2.1.3 Middle Palaeolithic
      • 2.1.4 Upper Palaeolithic
    • 2.2 Mesolithic
    • 2.3 Neolithic
    • 2.4 Iron Age
    • 2.5 Greek and Roman Period
    • 2.6 11th to 15th centuries
  • 3 Americas
    • 3.1 Lithic/Paleoindian (before 8000 BCE)
    • 3.2 Archaic (8000-1000 BCE)
    • 3.3 Formative (1000 BCE-250/500 CE)
    • 3.4 Classic (250/500-1200 CE)
    • 3.5 Post-Classic (1200-1900 CE)
  • 4 Oceania
    • 4.1 Palaeolithic
    • 4.2 Classical Period
  • 5 Europe
    • 5.1 Palaeolithic
      • 5.1.1 Lower
      • 5.1.2 Middle
      • 5.1.3 Upper
    • 5.2 Mesolithic
    • 5.3 Neolithic
    • 5.4 Bronze Age
    • 5.5 Iron Age, Early Greco-Roman Period
    • 5.6 Greek and Roman Period
    • 5.7 Early Medieval
